pyhpeimc.tests.test_machine module¶

This file is used to populate values to select what specific vendors to test various vendors specific functionality again. If you do not have a specific vendors device, or don’t wish to test against a specific vendors device, change the value of that specific variable to None and all tests associated with that specific vendor will automatically be skipped.

pyhpeimc.tests.test_machine.test_interface_down = False¶

#Template for building Multiple Vendor Tests
